songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, yeah
This right here was written by Jordan
Jordan is a 17-year old girl from a small town in Texas
And she wrote this love song about her crush Andy
And I'm gonna rap it for her
So, Andy, this is for you

[Verse]
Yo, dear Andy, I want you to know
That even though my skin is dark, deep inside I glow
Especially when I see you
Yesterday you talked to me, but I want a redo
See, I could tell that you were nervous because of your friends
And I can tell they don't like me because of my skin
Your friend Kurt he ain't never been sweet
He moved away from me when I tried to take the seat next to him
And gave me a nasty face
There's no winners and losers in the human race
The feelings that you give me are a needle in a haystack
I just wanna make you lemonade, so we can lay back
And you can hold my hand
I know that you like me and wanna be my man
I wanna be your girlfriend, do you understand?
Just know that deep inside I'm comfortable with who I am
I've never gone all of the way
But if you asked me to I would say ok
Just promise you'll respect me and treat me friendly
And if somebody messes with me you'll defend me
I wanna keep your heart in my pocket
You can be the ice cream, I can be the chocolate
But if you won't date me because I'm black
I take this whole entire song back
They say the blacker the berry, the sweeter the juice
I say that life isn't scary if you're living your truth
I don't care if they talk about us and spread rumors
'Cause hateful thoughts are really just brain tumors
The blacker the berry the sweeter the juice
I say that life isn't scary if you're living your truth
So let's be honest and show the world
I wanna be your queen, your lady, your girl

[Outro]
From Jordan
songs.title: A 17 Year Old Girl Wrote This About Her Crush
